articles.description: Aggies fans are used to watching their team fizzle late in the season, but elite recruiting and strength in the trenches make this team different.
articles.content:
During Jimbo Fisher's first practice at Texas A&M, he made a proclamation about who was in charge and what he expected.
"It ain't how it used to be," Fisher barked. "It ain't gonna be how it use… [+10472 chars]

articles.title: Pete Prisco's Week 15 NFL picks: Giants, Cowboys, Washington all deliver upset wins in tight NFC East race - CBS Sports
articles.description: Prisco reveals his picks for Week 15, including why the Bears and Patriots will contribute to an upset-heavy slate
articles.content:
The stinky streak is over.
After two awful weeks, I got back on track with my picks in Week 14. The record was 9-7 against the spread, making my season record 99-104-3. Damn, those two weeks really … [+6526 chars]
